course_title: Special Topics: Political Science: Black Radical Thought
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 5 / Seats Avail: 1Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
(Same as AAS 385 7)
This course explores the history, theories, voices and strategies African Americans have and continue to employ in the fight for Black liberation.
course_description: Selected topics and problems in political science. Content will vary in successive offerings of this course. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
